thread.title: Toddler found alone on porch of home on Cleveland's East Side
thread.title_full: Toddler found alone on porch of home on Cleveland's East Side

author: Cliff Pinckard, cleveland.com
title: Toddler found alone on porch of home on Cleveland's East Side

organizations.name: cuyahoga county family and children services

text: The 1-year-old girl has been placed in the care of Cuyahoga County Family and Children Services, police say.
